divs: Sighting Details Me and my girl friend were out side in my back yard looking at the stars at about 1 in the morning. It was a cloudless nite. In the middle of the sky suddenly appeared what looked like the britest star i had ever seen. After about 2 seconds it lost most of its light and started moving north at the speed of a satelite. After about 8 more seconds it just faded away.Not out of my site range but disaapeared. As it suddenly appeared I had a strong feeling it was a non terrestrial vehical and was under intelligent control as it appeared stationary then started moving.
Summary: Brite yellow light suddenly appears in middle of sky fades away in 6 seconds
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mukilteo
This sighting has never been favorited.
